Classes: forest, canyon, building, livingroom, library, supermarket

Notes: Each emotion has 6 faces, 3 male and 3 female, with young, middle, and old age each

Classes: mammal, fruit/veg, bird, musical instrument, vehicle, tool, nonsense
Notes: Nonsese objects are real-looking things that have no names or recognizable functions
These are 'interwoven' objects created by intermixing grids of objects from a single category, while maintaining correct tile location
